## Facade.minimize property

Enables minification of built assets.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
minimize: minimize;
```

## Example 1

Enable:

```js
bud.minimize()
```

## Example 2

Explicitly disable:

```js
bud.minimize(false)
```

## Example 3

Explicitly enable:

```js
bud.minimize(true)
```
